LanguageData.ra2_EarthHammer.label: Earth hammer defense device
LanguageData.ra2_EarthHammer.description: The Soviet Union's defensive weapons,can cause earthquakes at targets and cause extensive destruction.Can cross the fence to attack the enemy.
